description: Change hataf-patah under resh to sheva.
refuni: bet dagesh qamats resh hataf-patah kaf hiriq munah yod
changeuni: bet dagesh qamats resh sheva kaf hiriq munah yod
notes: No hint of a patah appears after the sheva on the resh. The ascender from the lamed on the following line would not obscure a patah of a hataf-patah.
BHL has a hataf-patah under the resh. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Change tipeha under he to dehi.
refuni: he tipeha vav dagesh alef
changeuni: he dehi vav dagesh alef
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark is sufficiently offset to the right to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the he. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change dehi under ayin to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: ayin dehi vav holam lamed qamats final-mem
changeuni: ayin tipeha vav holam lamed qamats final-mem
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark under the mem is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a dehi under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change dehi under he to tipeha.
refuni: he dehi vav holam dalet
changeuni: he tipeha vav holam dalet
notes: BHL has a tipeha under the he. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change meteg to tipeha under yod.
refuni: yod patah meteg ayin patah mem sheva dalet vav dagesh maqaf
changeuni: yod patah tipeha ayin patah mem sheva dalet vav dagesh maqaf
notes: The diagonal mark under the yod is thicker than expected and not of uniform width; it may be a result of a correction. The ascender of a lamed on the following line precludes positioning the tipeha immediately after the patah. Space is available, however, to write a dehi prepositively if that had been the intent.
BHL has a patah then tipeha under the yod. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Add meteg under first vav. Remove meteg under bet. Add merkha under second vav. Add note 't'.
refuni: yod sheva shin shin-dot vav dagesh bet meteg vav dagesh final-nun sof-pasuq
changeuni: yod sheva shin shin-dot vav dagesh meteg bet vav dagesh merkha final-nun sof-pasuq
notes: The accents on this word are unexpected.
The first near-vertical line is midway between the shin and the first vav. It will be transcribed as a meteg under the first vav.
The second diagonal line has excellent northeast-to-southwest inclination to be considered a merkha; it is midway between the bet and the second vav. It will be transcribed as a merkha under the vav.
BHL has metegs under both the shin and the bet. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Remove dagesh from yod.
refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq shin sin-dot dagesh qamats munah alef
changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq shin sin-dot dagesh qamats munah alef
notes: BHL has a dagesh in the yod. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the yod; Ben Denckla points out that it has a strange holam between the shin and the alef that is not part of this change. BHL Appendix A agrees with this change's removal of the dagesh on the yod, however.

description: Change meteg under mem to merkha.
refuni: bet dagesh sheva mem patah meteg ayin patah lamed sheva lamed tsere yod he segol meteg final-mem sof-pasuq
changeuni: bet dagesh sheva mem patah merkha ayin patah lamed sheva lamed tsere yod he segol meteg final-mem sof-pasuq
notes: The diagonal line under the mem has a clear northeast-to-southwest inclination and will be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a merkha under the mem. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Move mahapakh from resh to bet. Add meteg to resh. Add note 't'.
refuni: bet dagesh qamats resh mahapakh vav dagesh final-kaf sheva maqaf
changeuni: bet dagesh qamats mahapakh resh meteg vav dagesh final-kaf sheva maqaf
notes: The marking under the bet and resh is very confusing.
A mahapakh is apparent between the bet and the resh; it will be transcribed on the bet.
A nearly-vertical line appears under the resh; it will be transcribed as a meteg.
With these two understandings, an odd mark connecting the mahapakh and the meteg remains.
BHL has a qamats then mahapakh under the bet and a meteg under the resh. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change meteg to merkha under second vav. Add note 't'.
refuni: vav dagesh meteg geresh-muqdam mem tsere ayin hataf-patah vav holam-haser meteg nun holam tav tsere yod he segol revia final-mem
changeuni: vav dagesh meteg geresh-muqdam mem tsere ayin hataf-patah vav holam-haser merkha nun holam tav tsere yod he segol revia final-mem
notes: A reddish dot appears under the yod. It will be considered a defect and ignored.
The revia above the he is not very dark and above its expected position.
BHL has a merkha under the second vav. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Add ole over alef.
refuni: alef segol ayin sheva lamed holam merkha zayin qamats he
changeuni: alef segol ole ayin sheva lamed holam merkha zayin qamats he
notes: The sheva under the ayin is smeared.
BHL has an ole over the alef. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Remove dagesh from first vav.
refuni: vav dagesh geresh-muqdam tav sheva pe hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tav revia vav holam
changeuni: vav geresh-muqdam tav sheva pe hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tav revia vav holam
notes: BHL has a dagesh in the first vav. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the first vav.

description: Change dehi under the he to tipeha.
refuni: he dehi vav holam shin shin-dot hiriq yod ayin tsere munah nun hiriq yod
changeuni: he tipeha vav holam shin shin-dot hiriq yod ayin tsere munah nun hiriq yod
notes: BHL has a tipeha under the he. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change dehi under the dalet to tipeha.
refuni: dalet dagesh dehi vav holam resh
changeuni: dalet dagesh tipeha vav holam resh
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark under the dalet is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a tipeha under the dalet. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change dehi under kaf to tipeha.
refuni: kaf dagesh holam dehi lamed
changeuni: kaf dagesh holam tipeha lamed
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a tipeha under the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Change dehi under kaf to tipeha.
refuni: kaf dagesh holam dehi lamed
changeuni: kaf dagesh holam tipeha lamed
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a tipeha under the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Add ole above alef.
refuni: vav patah yod dagesh qamats atnah-hafukh alef segol resh
changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh qamats atnah-hafukh alef segol ole resh
notes: BHL has a qamats followed by atnah-hafukh on the yod and an ole above the alef. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change dehi under lamed to tipeha.
refuni: lamed holam dehi alef
changeuni: lamed holam tipeha alef
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a tipeha under the lamed. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change meteg under the shin to merkha.
refuni: tav dagesh sheva geresh-muqdam shin shin-dot meteg vav dagesh ayin qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
changeuni: tav dagesh sheva geresh-muqdam shin shin-dot merkha vav dagesh ayin qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
notes: The merkha appears to have been written over a meteg.
BHL has a merkha under the shin. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Add maqaf at end of word.
refuni: lamed sheva meteg kaf qamats lamed
changeuni: lamed sheva meteg kaf qamats lamed maqaf
notes: BHL has a maqaf at the end of the word. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Remove revia over the kaf. Add note 't'.
refuni: kaf dagesh tsere geresh-muqdam revia final-nun
changeuni: kaf dagesh tsere geresh-muqdam final-nun
notes: A split geresh-muqdam is apparent over the kaf. The smeared area after it might be taken as a revia; however, the evidence is too weak to transcribe a revia over the kaf.
BHL has geresh-muqdam followed by a revia over the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Replace meteg under first tav with merkha.
refuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam tav meteg vav holam resh qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
changeuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam tav merkha vav holam resh qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
notes: BHL has a merkha under the first tav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Examine strange markings through the resh and nun.
refuni: yod patah ayin hataf-patah zayin sheva resh qubuts meteg nun hiriq yod sof-pasuq
changeuni: yod patah ayin hataf-patah zayin sheva resh qubuts meteg nun hiriq yod sof-pasuq
notes: The resh and the nun are connected by a near-horizontal line which is clearly not a maqaf. The line has no textual relevance and will be ignored.
BHL has a patah under the ayin and no dagesh in the nun. BHL Appendix A has a hataf-patah under the ayin and a dagesh in the nun.

description: Move revia from over tav to over the kaf.
refuni: mem hiriq geresh-muqdam tsadi sheva vav holam-haser tav segol revia yod final-kaf qamats
changeuni: mem hiriq geresh-muqdam tsadi sheva vav holam-haser tav segol yod final-kaf qamats revia
notes: No revia is apparent over the tav. A revia is mixed with a rafe over the kaf.
BHL has a revia over the tav and has no revia over the kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Add paseq (and space) at end of word. Add note 't'.
refuni: kaf dagesh hiriq mahapakh yod
changeuni: kaf dagesh hiriq mahapakh yod space paseq
notes: The paseq is light and near an erasure. The UXLC adds a space before each paseq for display purposes.
BHL has no paseq at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has a paseq at the end of this word with a '?' in parentheses.

description: Examine marking above the nun as being a qarney-para ("great pazer"). Add note 't'.
refuni: yod qamats nun pazer vav dagesh het patah
changeuni: yod qamats nun pazer vav dagesh het patah
notes: The accent qarney-para, "great pazer" (נ֟) is usually found only in books outside of the Sifrei Emet. The circles at the ends of the "horns" are a modern embellishment and not a factor in the decision making. The mark is likely to be a poorly written, but ordinary, pazer.
BHL has an ordinary pazer over the nun. BHL Appendix A has no note on this word in the verse. It does note word 12, however.

description: Remove dagesh from tsadi.
refuni: he patah tsadi dagesh patah dalet dagesh hiriq yod qof hiriq qadma yod final-mem
changeuni: he patah tsadi patah dalet dagesh hiriq yod qof hiriq qadma yod final-mem
notes: BHL has a dagesh in the tsadi. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the tsadi.

description: Change dehi under vav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: vav dagesh dehi resh sheva alef tsere he
changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha resh sheva alef tsere he
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a dehi under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Examine dagesh in samekh.
refuni: vav sheva yod hiriq samekh dagesh holam munah gimel vav dagesh
changeuni: vav sheva yod hiriq samekh dagesh holam munah gimel vav dagesh
notes: The dagesh in the samekh is small and blended in to the left side of the samekh. Its vertical position and color are an indication that it was placed as a dagesh.
BHL has a dagesh in the samekh. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Add dagesh to shin.
refuni: shin shin-dot segol yod dagesh holam resh tsere dalet zinor
changeuni: shin shin-dot dagesh segol yod dagesh holam resh tsere dalet zinor
notes: The dagesh in the shin is dark and well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the shin. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh in the shin and a '?' in parentheses.

description: Move ole from mem to ayin.
refuni: he patah meteg mem dagesh patah ole ayin hataf-patah lamed merkha vav holam tav
changeuni: he patah meteg mem dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah ole lamed merkha vav holam tav
notes: BHL has an ole over the ayin. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Change dehi under vav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: vav dagesh dehi mem holam pe sheva tav hiriq yod final-mem
changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha mem holam pe sheva tav hiriq yod final-mem
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the vav. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change merkha under bet to meteg.
refuni: tav dagesh hiriq dalet sheva bet dagesh patah merkha qof maqaf
changeuni: tav dagesh hiriq dalet sheva bet dagesh patah meteg qof maqaf
notes: BHL has a patah then meteg under the bet. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Move ole from alef to first kaf.
refuni: alef segol ole zayin sheva kaf dagesh sheva resh tsere merkha kaf hiriq yod
changeuni: alef segol zayin sheva kaf dagesh sheva ole resh tsere merkha kaf hiriq yod
notes: BHL has no ole over the alef; it has an ole over the first kaf. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change patah under ayin to qamats.
refuni: ayin patah geresh-muqdam revia dalet
changeuni: ayin qamats geresh-muqdam revia dalet
notes: BHL has a patah under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has a qamats under the ayin and a '?' in parentheses.

description: Change merkha under kaf to meteg. Add maqaf at end of word.
refuni: kaf dagesh hiriq merkha yod
changeuni: kaf dagesh hiriq meteg yod maqaf
notes: BHL has a hiriq then meteg under the kaf. BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change dehi under the alef to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: alef holam dehi yod sheva bet patah yod
changeuni: alef holam tipeha yod sheva bet patah yod
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark under the kaf is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available to position the mark prepositively.
BHL has a dehi under the alef. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
refuni: kaf dagesh sheva meteg mem vav holam maqaf
changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva meteg mem vav holam
notes: BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no note for this verse.

description: Change patah under bet to qamats. Remove meteg from under the bet.
refuni: bet dagesh patah meteg lamed maqaf
changeuni: bet dagesh qamats lamed maqaf
notes: BHL has only a patah under the bet. BHL Appendix A has only a qamats under the bet.

description: Remove dagesh from vav.
refuni: vav dagesh geresh-muqdam tav sheva pe hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tav hiriq revia yod
changeuni: vav geresh-muqdam tav sheva pe hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tav hiriq revia yod
notes: BHL has a dagesh in the vav. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the vav.

description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
refuni: yod sheva meteg dalet patah bet dagesh segol ole resh maqaf
changeuni: yod sheva meteg dalet patah bet dagesh segol ole resh
notes: BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Change dehi under he to tipeha.
refuni: he dehi vav dagesh alef
changeuni: he tipeha vav dagesh alef
notes: The dehi/tipeha mark under the he is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a tipeha under the he. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

description: Merge this word with the following word.
refuni: he patah merkha lamed sheva lamed vav dagesh space yod qamats qadma he dagesh space paseq
changeuni: he patah merkha lamed sheva lamed vav dagesh yod qamats qadma he dagesh space paseq
notes: BHL has a distinct space between the vav and the yod; it has a merkha under the initial he. BHL Appendix A has no space between the vav and the yod; it has a meteg under the initial he. BHL Appendix A agrees with this change's merger of the two words, however.

description: Merge this word with the following word.
refuni: he patah merkha lamed sheva lamed vav dagesh space yod qamats qadma he dagesh space paseq
changeuni: he patah merkha lamed sheva lamed vav dagesh yod qamats qadma he dagesh space paseq
notes: BHL has a distinct space between the vav and the yod; it has a merkha under the initial he. BHL Appendix A has no space between the vav and the yod; it has a meteg under the initial he. BHL Appendix A agrees with this change's merger of the two words, however.

description: Change merkha to meteg.
refuni: resh merkha vav dagesh het patah maqaf
changeuni: resh meteg vav dagesh het patah maqaf
notes: BHL has a meteg under the resh. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

description: Add paseq at end of word.
refuni: lamed tsere munah final-kaf sheva
changeuni: lamed tsere munah final-kaf sheva space paseq
notes: For display purposes the UXLC adds a space before each paseq. This is the only instance in which a space occurs within a UXLC word.
BHL has a paseq after the kaf. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

description: Change segol under second mem to tsere.
refuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh segol etnahta nun dagesh qamats he
changeuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh tsere etnahta nun dagesh qamats he
notes: The evidence for the third, lower dot of a putative segol under the second mem is very slight.
BHL has a segol under the second mem. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine mark below the qof as possible merkha. Add note 't'
refuni: yod hiriq qof dagesh qamats meteg het sof-pasuq
notes: The mark below the qof has the northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. Since this word occurs at the end of the verse, the mark should be a meteg acting as a siluq; a merkha is inappropriate here. Adding note 't'.
BHL has a meteg under the qof. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Add maqaf at end of word.
refuni: tav dagesh sheva meteg alef tsere he hataf-patah bet ole vav dagesh
changeuni: tav dagesh sheva meteg alef tsere he hataf-patah bet ole vav dagesh maqaf
notes: The maqaf between the vav of this word and the pe of the following word is clear.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
refuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ayin hataf-patah lamed patah ole tav maqaf
changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ayin hataf-patah lamed patah ole tav
notes: No maqaf is present between this word's tav and the following word's het.
BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Add maqaf at end of word.
refuni: vav sheva he segol het hataf-segol zayin hiriq munah yod qof qamats he
changeuni: vav sheva he segol het hataf-segol zayin hiriq munah yod qof qamats he maqaf
notes: BHL has no maqaf on this word; BHLA has a maqaf on this word with a '?' in parentheses.

description: Change qamats under tet to segol.
refuni: tet qamats munah bet patah het
changeuni: tet segol munah bet patah het
notes: BHL has a segol under the tet. BHLA has a note on another word, word 11.

description: Examine possible dagesh in first vav.
refuni: yod hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva vav vav dagesh maqaf
changeuni: yod hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva vav vav dagesh maqaf
notes: The putative dagesh in the first vav is lighter and larger than adjacent dots. This is likely to have been an erasure.
BHL has no dagesh in the first vav. BHLA has no note on this verse.

description: Examine qamats under the ayin. Add note 't'.
refuni: ayin qamats pe sheva resh merkha vav holam tav
changeuni: ayin qamats pe sheva resh merkha vav holam tav
notes: The dot under the horizontal line under the ayin is well-positioned and well-sized; but of reddish color. It will be transcribed as a qamats with a 't' note.
BHL has a patah under ayin. BHLA has a qamats under the ayin with a '?' in parentheses.

description: Change mark under the tet to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: tet dehi vav holam bet
changeuni: tet tipeha vav holam bet
notes: The mark under the tet isn't sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available for it to be made prepositive. Adding a note 'd'.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the tet. BHLA makes no comment on this verse.

description: Change dehi under the mem to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: mem dehi vav dagesh samekh qamats resh
changeuni: mem tipeha vav dagesh samekh qamats resh
notes: The mark under the mem is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi, although space is available to do so.
BHA has a dehi below the mem. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine the mark under the resh as possible merkha. Place the meteg before the hiriq under the resh with a CGJ. Add note 't'.
refuni: alef patah kaf sheva zayin qamats resh hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
changeuni: alef patah kaf sheva zayin qamats resh meteg CGJ hiriq yod sof-pasuq
notes: The mark below the qof has the northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. Since this word occurs at the end of the verse, the mark should be a meteg acting as a siluq; a merkha is inappropriate here. Adding note 't'.
BHL has a meteg after the hiriq. BHLA has no entry for this verse.
changeuni_gen: alef patah kaf sheva zayin qamats resh meteg combining-grapheme-joiner hiriq yod sof-pasuq

description: Change dehi under bet to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: bet dagesh dehi vav holam tet segol he
changeuni: bet dagesh tipeha vav holam tet segol he
notes: The mark under the bet isn't sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Adding note 'd'.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change dehi under alef to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: alef holam dehi kaf segol lamed
changeuni: alef holam tipeha kaf segol lamed
notes: The mark under the alef is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available write the mark prepositively. Add note 'd'.
The Aleppo Codex and the BHL have a dehi under the alef. BHLA has a tipeha under the alef.

description: Add maqaf to end of word.

changeuni: ayin holam munah shin shin-dot tsere meteg qof maqaf

description: Change dehi under shin to tipeha. Add note 'd'.

changeuni: shin shin-dot holam tipeha mem patah ayin patah tav
notes: The mark under the shin is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Add dagesh to lamed. Add note 't'.
refuni: lamed holam alef maqaf
changeuni: lamed dagesh holam alef maqaf
notes: The putative dagesh is dark, well-formed, but slightly off-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHLA has a dagesh in the lamed with a '?' in parentheses.

description: Examine tsere under the lamed as a possible segol. Add note 't'.
refuni: lamed tsere bet maqaf
changeuni: lamed tsere bet maqaf
notes: The text is in poor condition on this page. The lower dot of a putative segol under the lamed is very indistinct and off-centered.
BHL has a tsere under the lamed. BHLA has a note for word 8, but not for this word.

description: Remove revia over the alef.
refuni: alef patah geresh-muqdam revia final-pe
changeuni: alef patah geresh-muqdam final-pe
notes: BHL has no revia over the alef. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Remove dagesh from kaf.

changeuni: kaf sheva samekh hiriq yod lamed hiriq meteg yod final-mem sof-pasuq
notes: The inner space of the kaf is empty; possibly something was erased.
BHL has a dagesh in the kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine dagesh in first yod. Add note 't'.
refuni: he patah dehi yod dagesh patah yod final-nun
changeuni: he patah dehi yod dagesh patah yod final-nun
notes: The dagesh in the first yod is hard to see.
BHL has a dagesh in the first yod. BHLA has no dagesh in the first yod.

description: Change dehi under tav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: tav dagesh dehi vav holam ayin segol he
changeuni: tav dagesh tipeha vav holam ayin segol he
notes: The mark under the tav is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Move meteg under vav to precede the segol adding CGJ after meteg.
refuni: mem patah lamed sheva vav segol meteg he sof-pasuq
changeuni: mem patah lamed sheva vav meteg CGJ segol he sof-pasuq
notes: The meteg clearly appears before the segol. The CGJ is added to preserve the mark ordering.
BHL has the meteg after the segol. BHLA has the meteg before the segol.
changeuni_gen: mem patah lamed sheva vav meteg combining-grapheme-joiner segol he sof-pasuq

description: Change dehi under vav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: vav dagesh dehi shin shin-dot sheva mem patah ayin
changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha shin shin-dot sheva mem patah ayin
notes: The mark under the vav is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Add note 'd'.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the vav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Add dagesh to mem. Remove maqaf from end of word.
refuni: kaf dagesh sheva mem vav holam maqaf
changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva mem dagesh vav holam
notes: The text has poor quality; however, the dagesh in the mem and lack of maqaf are clear.
BHL has no dagesh in the mem and no maqaf at the end of the word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Add dagesh to first yod.
refuni: yod patah yod hiriq final-nun zinor
changeuni: yod dagesh patah yod hiriq final-nun zinor
notes: The dagesh in the first yod is dark and well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the first yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Move holam from vav to tet and add dagesh to vav.
refuni: tet meteg vav holam bet sof-pasuq
changeuni: tet holam meteg vav dagesh bet sof-pasuq
notes: A dark, but connected holam is visible at the end of the tet. Visually it belongs to the tet, not the vav.
The dagesh in the vav is poorly shaped; however, it is well-positioned and dark.
BHL has a holam on the vav and no dagesh in the vav. BHLA has a holam on the vav and a dagesh in the vav.

changeuni: mem vav dagesh samekh dagesh qamats meteg resh sof-pasuq

BHL has no dagesh in the samekh. BHLA has a dagesh in the samekh and a '?' in parentheses.

refuni: bet dagesh sheva mem patah shin sin-dot sheva kaf dagesh hiriq yod dagesh merkha vav holam tav
changeuni: bet dagesh sheva mem patah shin sin-dot sheva kaf dagesh hiriq yod dagesh munah vav holam tav
notes: The accent under the yod is clearly a munah rather than a merkha.
BHL has a munah under the yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Add dagesh to lamed.
refuni: lamed holam alef maqaf
changeuni: lamed dagesh holam alef maqaf
notes: The dot within the lamed is well-positioned and well-formed.
BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHLA has a dagesh in the lamed.

description: Change meteg under resh to merkha.

changeuni: resh tsere merkha ayin hataf-patah final-kaf qamats qadma

BHL has a merkha under the resh. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine accent under tet as being a tipeha rather than a dehi. Add note 't'.
refuni: tet dehi vav holam resh tsere dalet
changeuni: tet dehi vav holam resh tsere dalet
notes: The accent under the text is very slightly prepositive.
BHL has a dehi under the tet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

refuni: gimel dagesh segol munah bet segol resh
changeuni: gimel dagesh bet segol resh

BHL has a segol then munah under the gimel and no maqaf at the end. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change meteg below gimel to merkha. Remove maqaf at end of word.

changeuni: gimel dagesh patah merkha final-mem

BHL has a merkha under the gimel and no maqaf at the end of the word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change merkha under he to meteg. Add note 'm'.

changeuni: nun hiriq meteg bet hataf-qamats he qamats meteg lamed
notes: The line under the he lacks the northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha.

refuni: nun patah pe sheva shin shin-dot etnachta vav holam
changeuni: nun dagesh patah pe sheva shin shin-dot etnachta vav holam
notes: The dot in the nun is brownish, but well-positioned and well-sized.
BHL has no dagesh in the nun. BHLA has a dagesh in the nun and a '?' in parentheses.

changeuni: alef hiriq mem dagesh sheva resh patah munah tav
notes: The dot is small, but distinct and well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the mem. BHLA has dagesh in the mem and a '?' in parentheses.

description: Change munah under kaf to meteg.

changeuni: shin shin-dot tsere kaf qamats meteg resh
notes: The line under the kaf has insufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha. It's clearly not a munah, however.
BHL has a munah under the kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Remove maqaf from end of word. Add note 'm'.
refuni: vav sheva tav meteg vav holam resh patah tav maqaf
changeuni: vav sheva tav meteg vav holam resh patah tav

BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word; however, it has a merkha under the first tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Remove the dagesh from the tsadi.

changeuni: mem hiriq tsadi hiriq nun dagesh hiriq merkha yod final-mem
notes: No evidence for a dagesh in the tsadi is available.
BHL has no dagesh in the tsadi. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine specks near lamed as possible dageshes.
refuni: lamed qamats meteg final-kaf sheva sof-pasuq
changeuni: lamed qamats meteg final-kaf sheva sof-pasuq
notes: Two small specks appear before and after the lamed. Although they are dark, they are much smaller than the sheva dots in the kaf.
BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Add revia above the mem. Add note 'c'.
refuni: vav sheva kaf hiriq yod mem tsere tipeha yod
changeuni: vav sheva kaf hiriq yod mem tsere tipeha revia yod
notes: The markings above the mem are confusing. The rightmost group is possibly a broken masora circle; however, a very clear, dark dot appears on the left. If the dot above the mem is taken as a revia, then the mem has two accents, a tipeha and a revia, which is very strange.
BHL has no revia above the mem. BHLA has both a revia and tipeha on the mem.

description: Add dagesh to vav.

changeuni: vav dagesh sheva geresh-muqdam alef patah het hataf-patah resh hiriq yod tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia

description: Consider adding a transcription note 't' because revia over bet is obscured by a rafe.

changeuni: ayin patah geresh-muqdam kaf dagesh qamats bet hiriq revia yod shin shin-dot
notes: The revia is visible in the left edge of the (untranscribed) rafe.
BHL has a revia over the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine mark below the he as being a tipeha instead of a dehi.

changeuni: he dehi vav dagesh alef
notes: The mark below the he is slightly displaced to the right allowing it to be transcribed as a dehi.

description: Remove meteg under the mem. Add note 't'.

changeuni: ayin hiriq mem dagesh vav holam sof-pasuq
notes: No meteg is present under the mem.

changeuni: kaf dagesh patah pe dagesh qamats yod sof-pasuq
notes: No meteg is apparent under the pe.

notes: The mark under the vav, currently transcribed as a dehi, is not sufficiently inclined to be taken as either a tipeha or dehi. The dehi in the previous text will be transcribed as a meteg. The merkha under the tav is not sufficiently inclined to be transcribed as a merkha. The merkha in the previous text will be transcribed as a meteg with an 'm' note.
BHL has a meteg under the vav and a merkha under the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine meteg/merkha accent under the first tav.

changeuni: tav dagesh patah meteg ayin hataf-patah lamed qubuts mem munah vav holam tav
notes: The line under the tav has insufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a meteg under the tav. BHLA has an entry for word 12 of this verse, but none on this word.

description: Remove maqaf from end of word.

changeuni: vav sheva alef segol tav
notes: BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no maqaf at the end of this word.

changeuni: mem tsere resh tsere munah yod dagesh patah het
notes: The dagesh in the yod is brownish, but well-positioned and well-sized. The patah is too far to the right to belong to the het.
BHL has no dagesh in the yod; it has a patah under the het. BHLA has a dagesh in the yod and a patah under the yod.

description: Change merkha under shin to meteg. Add note 'm'.

changeuni: tav dagesh qamats mahapakh shin shin-dot hiriq meteg yod tav

changeuni: vav sheva yod qamats lamed holam dalet

BHL has a qamats then munah under the yod and a meteg under the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

BHL has a patah under the he and has no dagesh in the mem. BHLA has a hataf patah under the he and NO dagesh in the mem.

description: Change dehi under alef to tipeha. Add note 'd'.

changeuni: alef tipeha vav holam resh

BHL has a dehi below the alef. BHLA has a tipeha below the alef.

description: Remove sheva under the kaf.
refuni: vav dagesh meteg tav sheva dalet patah kaf dagesh sheva alef vav dagesh nun patah merkha nun hiriq yod
changeuni: vav dagesh meteg tav sheva dalet patah kaf dagesh alef vav dagesh nun patah merkha nun hiriq yod

changeuni: het segol resh sheva pe dagesh qamats tav dagesh hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
notes: The dot in the tav is light and brownish, but is well-positioned and right-sized. The page doesn't have a lot of similar dots.

description: Add dagesh to qof.

changeuni: qof dagesh qamats dehi resh qamats alef tav hiriq yod
notes: The dagesh in the qof is brownish and larger than normal, but well-positioned.

changeuni: tav holam dehi alef mem sheva resh vav dagesh

description: Change sheva under vav to hiriq. Add note 't'.

changeuni: vav hiriq lamed holam meteg alef maqaf

BHL has a sheva under the vav. BHLA has a hiriq under the vav.

description: Change meteg under shin to merkha.

changeuni: vav dagesh geresh-muqdam tav sheva shin shin-dot merkha vav dagesh bet holam tav tsere yod kaf segol revia final-mem
notes: The mark below the shin has the distinct northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha.

description: Examine mark below lamed as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
refuni: lamed qamats meteg final-kaf sheva sof-pasuq
changeuni: lamed qamats meteg final-kaf sheva sof-pasuq

description: Change dehi below alef to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: alef dehi vav holam mem segol resh
changeuni: alef tipeha vav holam mem segol resh
notes: The mark below the alef is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the alef. BHLA has a tipeha under the alef.

description: Examine mark below alef as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
refuni: alef meteg vav holam resh sof-pasuq
changeuni: alef meteg vav holam resh sof-pasuq
notes: The mark below the alef has the distinctive northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. However, this is the last word in the verse and the writer probably intended a meteg. Add note 't'.
BHL has a meteg below the alef. BHLA has no entry for this word, though it does have an entry for word 2.

description: Examine mark below tav as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
refuni: alef patah nun sheva het qamats tav hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
changeuni: alef patah nun sheva het qamats tav hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
notes: The mark below the tav has the distinctive northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. However, this is the last word in the verse and the writer probably intended a meteg. Add note 't'.
BHL has a meteg below the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine mark below tav as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
refuni: tav dagesh sheva kaf vav dagesh nun qamats tav meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
changeuni: tav dagesh sheva kaf vav dagesh nun qamats tav meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
notes: The mark below the tav has the distinctive northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. However, this is the last word in the verse and the writer probably intended a meteg. Add note 't'.
BHL has a meteg below the second tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine mark below het as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
refuni: tav vav holam kaf qamats het meteg vav holam tav sof-pasuq
changeuni: tav vav holam kaf qamats het meteg vav holam tav sof-pasuq

BHL has a meteg below the het. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change meteg under first bet to merkha.

changeuni: bet dagesh patah merkha mem dagesh hiriq dalet sheva bet dagesh qamats revia resh

BHL has a merkha under the first bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change segol under ayin the tsere.

changeuni: resh holam ayin tsere munah he
notes: The putative lower dot for the segol is very light. A similar light dots appear under the resh and before the munah under the ayin.
BHL has a segol under the ayin. BHLA has a tsere under the ayin and a '?' in parentheses.

description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
refuni: het patah yod maqaf
changeuni: het patah yod
notes: No maqaf is apparent between the yod of this word and the following alef.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no maqaf at the end of this word.

description: Remove hiriq under the yod.

changeuni: vav sheva ayin patah merkha yod final-nun

BHL has a hiriq under the yod . BHLA has no hiriq under the yod.

changeuni: resh tipeha vav dagesh het patah
notes: The mark under the resh is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the resh. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Position meteg before the hiriq under the lamed using a CGJ.

changeuni: resh patah gimel sheva lamed meteg CGJ hiriq yod sof-pasuq

BHL has the meteg after the hiriq. BHLA has the meteg before the hiriq.

description: Move meteg from under alef to under vav.

changeuni: mem qubuts alef vav dagesh meteg final-mem sof-pasuq
notes: BHL has only a meteg (acting as a siluq) under the mem; it has no qubuts under the mem. The BHLA has a meteg (acting as a siluq) on the vav.

description: Change merkha under mem to meteg. Add note 'm'.
refuni: vav patah yod dagesh holam ole alef mem patah merkha resh
changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh holam ole alef mem patah meteg resh
notes: The vertical mark under the mem lacks sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha. Adding note 'm'. The author points out the possible traces of a sof pasuq at the end of the word. If the verse had ended with this word, as suggested by the traces of the sof pasuq, then a meteg acting as a siluq would have been expected.
BHL has a merkha under the mem. BHLA has no entry for this word, word 6; it does have an entry for word 11.

changeuni: yod sheva shin shin-dot hiriq yod shin shin-dot etnachta ZWJ hiriq yod final-mem

BHL has the hiriq before the etnachta under the second shin. BHLA has the hiriq following the etnachta under the second shin.
changeuni_gen: yod sheva shin shin-dot hiriq yod shin shin-dot etnahta zero-width-joiner hiriq yod final-mem

description: Remove dagesh from dalet.

changeuni: dalet tsere ayin hiriq munah yod

changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ayin hataf-patah ole bet holam merkha dalet vav dagesh
notes: The ole is clearly over the ayin.
BHL has an ole over the ayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change merkha under lamed to meteg. Add note 'm'. Remove maqaf at end of word.
refuni: lamed holam merkha alef maqaf
changeuni: lamed holam meteg alef maqaf
notes: A maqaf may have been erased at the end of this word. The erasure has "dented" the top of the nun.
BHL has a merkha under the lamed and no maqaf at the end of the word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change dehi under the lamed to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
refuni: lamed dehi vav holam
changeuni: lamed tipeha vav holam
notes: The mark under the lamed is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Remove the revia above the bet.
refuni: tav qamats geresh-muqdam bet hiriq revia yod final-nun
changeuni: tav qamats geresh-muqdam bet hiriq yod final-nun
notes: The only mark above the bet is a rafe which is not ordinarily transcribed here.
BHL has no revia above the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine markings above the resh.
refuni: alef segol geresh-muqdam bet sheva resh qamats revia he
changeuni: alef segol geresh-muqdam bet sheva resh qamats revia he
notes: The resh has 3 marks above it. Moving from right-to-left, the rightmost dot/blob is the transcribed revia. The second, middle, mark over the resh is the meteg on the samekh from the last word, word 8, יֶאֱסֹֽף׃ of the preceding verse, Job 39:12. The third, leftmost, mark over the resh is tail of the final pe of word 8.

Seth (Avi) Kadish offers a possible explanation for the rightmost dot/blob: The word אברה requires both a masorah circle and a small revia dot ( ◌֗ ). The masorah circle refers to the note ל' which says that אברה appears only once in the Bible (which is correct). The masorah circle may appear "malformed" precisely because the small dot for revia ( ◌֗ ) has collided with it.
BHL has a revia over the resh. BHLA has no revia over the resh and a '?' in parentheses.

description: Remove meteg from under the het. Add note 'c'.
refuni: het qamats meteg tav sof-pasuq
changeuni: het qamats tav sof-pasuq
notes: Although space is available to write a meteg under the het, none is visible. The verse should end with a meteg (acting as a siluq) on this word.
BHL has a meteg following the qamats under the het. BHLA has no meteg under the het.

description: Move darga under vav to under the yod.
refuni: vav patah darga yod dagesh holam samekh segol final-pe
changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh darga holam samekh segol final-pe
notes: The text is in poor condition here. A faint patah can be seen under the vav. A faint darga can be seen directly under the yod.
BHL has a darga under the yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change munah under vav to meteg. Add note 'm'.
refuni: yod sheva he vav qamats munah he space paseq
changeuni: yod sheva he vav qamats meteg he space paseq
notes: Both the Aleppo Codex and BHL have a merkha under the vav. The accent under the vav lacks the northeast-to-southwest inclination for transcription as a merkha. Hence, a transcription note 'm' is added.
BHL has a merkha under the vav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

changeuni: zayin sheva resh munah vav holam ayin

changeuni: tav dagesh hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh patah het hataf-patah vav dagesh tipeha vav dagesh

changeuni: vav dagesh shin shin-dot sheva mem patah meteg ayin sheva yod dagesh qamats qadma he vav dagesh

changeuni: alef segol tav maqaf

BHL has no dagesh in the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

changeuni: yod hiriq zayin sheva lamed munah vav dagesh
notes: Although the following lamed has a slight bulge on the leading edge, it lacks enough size to be transcribed as a dagesh.
BHL has a dagesh in the zayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Consider dagesh in mem. Add note 'c'.
refuni: mem dagesh sheva lamed qamats kaf zaqef-qatan vav holam tav
changeuni: mem dagesh sheva lamed qamats kaf zaqef-qatan vav holam tav
notes: The dagesh in the mem is slightly reddish and slightly over-sized, but well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the mem. BHLA has a dagesh in the mem.

description: Consider the near-vertical mark under the ayin.
refuni: tav dagesh sheva ayin holam meteg resh sheva resh tevir vav dagesh
changeuni: tav dagesh sheva ayin holam meteg resh sheva resh tevir vav dagesh
notes: The near-vertical mark under the ayin has a slight northeast-to-southwest inclination. Since the word already has a tevir on the resh, it's unlikely the writer intended a second accent on this word.
BHL has a meteg under the ayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine mark below ayin as possible hataf-patah.
refuni: tav dagesh patah ayin patah shin sin-dot hiriq meteg yod final-nun sof-pasuq
changeuni: tav dagesh patah ayin patah shin sin-dot hiriq meteg yod final-nun sof-pasuq
notes: A dot appears below the tav; however, it is too far from the patah to be taken as the sheva shape of a hataf-patah. It's likely to be part of the tail of the tav.
BHL has hataf-patah under the ayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Consider possible dagesh in lamed. Add note 't'.
refuni: lamed qamats zaqef-qatan he dagesh
changeuni: lamed qamats zaqef-qatan he dagesh
notes: A small, light, but well-positioned dagesh appears in the lamed. Add note 't'.
BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Examine all dageshes on this word. Add note 't'.
refuni: nun dagesh vav dagesh gimel tipeha vav holam tav
changeuni: nun dagesh vav dagesh gimel tipeha vav holam tav
notes: The text quality is poor and many dots might be considered as dageshes. The dagesh on the nun is light, but well-positioned and is the best candidate. The dagesh on the first vav is dark, but attached to the gimel. A potential dagesh/shuruq appears on the second vav, however, it is blurred and very light; whereas the holam is clear. A light dot even appears after the tav!

A dagesh in an initial nun is unexpected in normal Hebrew grammar; however, this particular dagesh in the nun is found in many Masoretic texts. Ben Denckla has found 115 instances of a dagesh in an initial nun in the UXLC. It is a special Masoretic form called a "דגש לתפארת הקריאה", or "accentual dagesh" (Reuben Alcalay Hebrew/English dictionary) meaning "elegant pronunciation". Thanks to Ben Denckla and Seth (Avi) Kadish for their comments on this dagesh.

Note: this verse has 4 words (of 16) marked with Masorah circles (not shown in the UXLC). They appear on words 3, 9, 12, and 13 (this word); all 4 of the Masoretic marginal notes indicate that these words are unique in the Tanach. This is confirmed by a consonants-only search of the UXLC text for each word.
BHL agrees with the existing UXLC text. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Remove dagesh from qof.
refuni: mem sheva bet patah qof dagesh sheva shin shin-dot hiriq munah yod final-mem
changeuni: mem sheva bet patah qof sheva shin shin-dot hiriq munah yod final-mem
notes: The dot in the qof is well-positioned but small, reddish, and very light. The dot in the final mem is ill-positioned, small, reddish, and very light. Other dots in this word are dark.
BHL has no dagesh in the qof. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change revia above alef to zaqef qatan.

changeuni: vav dagesh resh sheva alef zaqef-qatan vav dagesh
notes: The text is on the last line of column 2 and is poorly written. A zaqef qatan with the lower dot touching the alef is apparent. The dot near the top of the shown photo is from a qamats on the previous line.
BHL has a zaqef qatan over the alef. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Move pashta over resh to over gimel.

changeuni: he qamats resh patah gimel sheva pashta tav dagesh qamats pashta
notes: The pashta is clearly on the gimel.
BHL has the pashta over the resh. BHLA has the pashta over the gimel

description: Examine segol under the shin as a possible qamats. Add note 't'.
